no picture:  hopefully you still have the remote control.

using the remote   press the i/p button located on the bottom right corner of the remote.
the i/p button switches the tv display between interlace and progressive.
if this doesnt bring back the   try pressing this button without playing a dvd.
if you dont get video   now you can run the player over with your car!
picture scrolling in b/w:  you need the remote control for this so you better get it from your dog before he burries it in the backyard.
press the p/n button located on the bottom right corner of the remote.
the p/n button switches your dvd players video output signal between pal and ntsc.
by pressing p/  you should be able to get a good picture on the screen.
